# thetalake_analysis_policy_hits (Data Source)

Theta Lake Analysis Policy Hits Data Source. Retrieves a list of analysis policy hits.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "thetalake_analysis_policy_hits" "example" {}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `hits` (List of Object) List of policy hits (see below for nested schema)

<a id="nestedatt--hits"></a>
### Nested Schema for `hits`

Read-Only:

- `confidence` (Number) Confidence score
- `hit_date` (String) Date of the hit
- `id` (String) Hit ID
- `policy_id` (Number) Policy ID
- `record_id` (String) Record ID
